#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
	std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	ll t,a;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a;
		if(a%4==1 || a%4==3)
		{
			 printf("Lannisters always pays their debts\n");
		}
		else
		{
			printf("Valar Morghulis\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
